Screenwriter: Kevin DiCicco, Paul Tamasy, Aaron Mendelsohn
Distributor: Walt Disney Home Video [gb], Buena Vista Pictures
Synopsis: Diffident in the wake of his father's death, high schooler Josh (Kevin Zegers) struggles to adapt to his new home in Washington state. That all changes, however, when he signs up to be the school basketball team's manager and discovers that his pet dog Bud, a stray golden retriever he took in, can play the sport amazingly well. After Bud joins the team, Josh's life brightens considerably, until the dog's former owner Norm Snively (Michael Jeter) returns in hopes of reclaiming the pooch.
Title: Air Bud
